name: hemmelig
description: Hemmelig is a self hosted secret sharing application for sending encrypted notes that expire after viewing or a set time. It is useful for delivering passwords or confidential messages without leaving data on third party services.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Share secrets with end-to-end encryption for maximum security

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Add an additional password layer for extra security on sensitive secrets

features.title: Burn After Reading
features.description: Secrets are automatically deleted after the first view

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep sensitive data on your own infrastructure without third-party access
